7/ if you're interested in researching this more, DM me. we need more people focused on market infrastructure and driving the development of new models for how liquidity and flow might work in crypto markets

6/ if you're interested in crypto markets, spend less time looking at price and more time untangling market structures, bottlenecks in capital flows, and incompatibilities with existing banking and trading infrastructure

5/ the crypto market is still incredible young and immature, and structural constraints will continue to limit growth and create feedback loops that exacerbate the perceived volatility of the asset class

4/ it's also helpful to remember that @BittrexExchange @Poloniex and other crypto to crypto trading platforms are not taking new customers, and @coinbase @GeminiDotCom approvals take anywhere from 2 to 5 days

3/ the most vulnerable link in the crypto market is the exchange of fiat into and out of crypto, and it's the one place where governments and regulators can easily constrain growth by cutting off access
1/ if you're looking at crypto prices and see they're "down", remember that @CoinMarketCap removed for Korean exchanges from their price indices due to consistent premiums.
